thread.title: BRIEF-Be Think Solve Execute signs 4.3 mln euros contract
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Be Think Solve Execute signs 4.3 mln euros contract

title: BRIEF-Be Think Solve Execute signs 4.3 mln euros contract
text:
BRIEF-Be Think Solve Execute signs 4.3 mln euros contract Sept 21 
Sept 21 Be Think Solve Execute SpA : 
* Signs through its subsidiary Be Solutions Solve, Realize & Control SpA a 5 years contract (2015-2019) for provision of ICT services with a primary Italian Insurance Company 
* The 4.3 million euros ($4.86 million) contract concerns outsourcing of maintenance and evolution of application platform supporting core business of company Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: ($1 = 0.8851 euros) (Gdynia Newsroom) Trending On Reuters
